```{r}
## Closed chamber test

mhz19<-read_csv("MH-Z19_closed chamber_1.csv")
mhz16<-read_csv("MH-Z16_closed chamber_1.csv")
scd41<-read_csv("SDC41_closed chamber_1.csv")
summary(mhz19)
summary(mhz16)
summary(scd41)
```


```{r}
ggplot() +

  geom_line(aes(mhz19$TimeStamp,mhz19$Medici贸n, color = "green")) +
  geom_line(aes(mhz16$TimeStamp,mhz16$Medici贸n, color = "blue")) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = as.POSIXct("2022-04-02 17:00")) +
```
